attributes.additional_details:
Hi all if you are like me you may find it a little hard to accept Apples iTunes charging for the BBC content on it.
I believe that anyone in the UK that holds a TV licence should not have to pay for this content as it is surely OURS i.e. it was paid for by Licence holders and so is ours.
I have no problem with the BBC output being sold I just don't see why we have to pay for it twice.

This e-petition is for all UK TV licence holders to be able to get the BBC content on iTunes for free.

Terry
